name: Andariel, Silent Chollima, Stonefly, Operation “BLACKMINE”, Operation “GHOSTRAT”, Operation “XEDA”, Operation “INITROY”/Phase 1, Operation “DESERTWOLF”/Phase 3, Operation “BLACKSHEEP”/Phase 3., Operation “INITROY”/Phase 2, Operation “VANXATM”, Operation “Mayday”, Operation “GoldenAxe”
description:
